hanzi-su-wiki:
濃

Значения

Густой, темный; тесный, близкий; насыщенный, гной

Мнемоника

Искажено. Вверху — голова и руки согнувшегося человека. Работать внаклонку, чтобы помочь земле родить 辰, внося жидкий 氵 навоз. Сухие удобрения в Китае не использовались.

Варианты

浓

nóng
concentrated; dense; strong (smell etc)
концентрированный; плотный; сильный (запах и т. д.)

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 浓)
Antonyms: 淡
Pictophonetic: 農 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
濃厚 [ nóng hòu ]: dense; thick (fog, clouds etc); to have a strong interest in; deep; fully saturated (color)
濃度 [ nóng dù ]: concentration (percentage of dissolved material in a solution); consistency; thickness; density; viscosity
濃郁 [ nóng yù ]: rich; strong; heavy (fragrance); dense; full-bodied; intense
濃縮 [ nóng suō ]: to concentrate (a liquid); concentration; espresso coffee; abbr. for 意式浓缩咖啡
濃重 [ nóng zhòng ]: dense; thick; strong; rich (colors); heavy (aroma); deep (friendship); profound (effect)

heisig_chinese_memo: The agriculture of Florida is concentrated on making concentrated orange juice. Just add water! Imagine a can of FCOJ, dumping it into a pitcher and adding water.
heisig_constituent: concentrated, water, water droplets, water pistol, agriculture, bend, sign of the dragon, cliff, two, hairpin, safety-pin
heisig_story: Among other things, the key word refers to the thick consistency of liquids. Its elements: water . . . agriculture.
koohiiStory1: The agriculture of Florida is concentrated on making concentrated orange juice. Just add water! Imagine a can of FCOJ, dumping it into a pitcher and adding water.
koohiiStory2: Concentrated water is going to revolutionize the agriculture! Just add water... oh wait...
jp_example_words:
濃い(こい): thick (as of color, liquid), dense, strong
濃度(のうど): concentration, brightness
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If a tsunami hits while you're farming, you'll have to wear really thick clothes to deal with it. The water is thick with fish and cars and other ripped-up debris too, which makes it even harder.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine putting on your thick farming suit as the tsunami comes at you. You hold onto your hoe and brace yourself for the wall of water.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You knew to put on your thick tsunami-proof farming gear because Nostradamus (のう) warned you it was coming. He sent a message to your brain yesterday so you'd know what to wear today.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Thanks Nostradamus, now I'm in my nice, thick gear, struggling to hoe my fields through this wall of tsunami water. But I'm not dead and I'm not wet.
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 厂 (скала), 汁 (суп), 日 (день), 衣 (одежда), 辰 (знак Дракона)
Ru_trainchinese: nóng: (прил) плотный, густой, концентрированный; большой, сильный (напр., интерес)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: agricultural (農) water (氵) is thick
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Concentrated water will be the key to an agricultural revolution.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " water " to " nong " sound. This refers to a lot of dew, which means thick and dense. "Shuowen": "Dense, revealing too much." Duan Yucai's note: "Every farmer has a strong voice." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Liaoxiao": "Liaobixiaosi, zero dew and thick." "Mao Zhuan": "Dense, thick appearance." "Xijing Miscellaneous": "Brushing to the clouds, mist and dense atmosphere." Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty. Qingping Tune>: "Clouds want clothes and flowers, but the spring breeze blows the threshold.

" Dense " means more ingredients, as opposed to " light ". Such as "Latent Theory. "Phase column": "The appearance has microscopic appearance, the color has intensity, the behavior has the thickness, the fate has to go." Tang Dynasty Bai Juyi "Early Autumn and Evening Look": "Xunyang wine is very strong, and each other is always drunk." "Song History. "Biography of Yan Su": "The landscape is thick and light, and the image is slightly distant. It is especially good at folding bamboo from ancient trees."

" Nong " also means a deep degree. For example, in the Eastern Han Dynasty, Ban Gu's "General Dou's Beizheng Song": "Admiral Chong Zhi Ren, Xing Kai Yi, Hong Nong En, to cool down." Tang Dynasty Meng Jiao "Miscellaneous Complaint": "Hold this life thin, Hundreds of emptiness are filled with hatred." Southern Song Xin Qiji "Qinyuanchun": "Hanging on the ancient sorrows, conceiving people in the sun and sunset, and a heart returning from heaven."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and " nong ". This refers to a lot of dew, which means thick and dense.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「農」聲。本指露水多，引伸為厚、密的意思。《說文》：「濃，露多也。」段玉裁注：「凡農聲字皆訓厚。」如《詩．小雅．蓼蕭》：「蓼彼蕭斯，零露濃濃。」《毛傳》：「濃濃，厚貌。」《西京雜記》：「奔電屯雲，薄霧濃雰。」唐代李白〈清平調〉：「雲想衣裳花想容，春風拂檻露華濃。」

　　「濃」表示成分多，與「淡」相對。如《潛夫論．相列》：「表有顯微，色有濃淡，行有薄厚，命有去就。」唐代白居易〈早秋晚望〉：「潯陽酒甚濃，相勸時時醉。」《宋史．燕肅列傳》：「圖山水罨布濃淡，意象微遠，尤善為古木折竹。」

　　「濃」亦表示程度深，如東漢班固〈竇將軍北征頌〉：「上將崇至仁，行凱易，弘濃恩，降溫澤。」唐代孟郊〈雜怨〉：「持此一生薄，空成百恨濃。」南宋辛棄疾〈沁園春〉：「吊古愁濃，懷人日暮，一片心從天外歸。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「農」聲。本指露水多，引伸為厚、密的意思。

English Definition: concentrated; dense; strong (smell etc)

Total strokes: 16; Radical: 水
Pictophonetic: 農 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:

    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 農 [ nóng ] agriculture, farming; farmer

濃度 [ nóng dù ]: concentration (percentage of dissolved material in a solution); consistency; thickness; density; viscosity
濃郁 [ nóng yù ]: rich; strong; heavy (fragrance); dense; full-bodied; intense

濃重 [ nóng zhòng ]: dense; thick; strong; rich (colors); heavy (aroma); deep (friendship); profound (effect)

③淡薄。

濃い(こい): thick (as of color, liquid), dense, strong
濃度(のうど): concentration, brightness

從「 水 」，「 農 」聲。本指露水多，引伸為厚、密的意思。《說文》：「濃，露多也。」段玉裁注：「凡農聲字皆訓厚。」如《詩．小雅．蓼蕭》：「蓼彼蕭斯，零露濃濃。」《毛傳》：「濃濃，厚貌。」《西京雜記》：「奔電屯雲，薄霧濃雰。」唐代李白〈清平調〉：「雲想衣裳花想容，春風拂檻露華濃。」 「 濃 」表示成分多，與「 淡 」相對。如《潛夫論．相列》：「表有顯微，色有濃淡，行有薄厚，命有去就。」唐代白居易〈早秋晚望〉：「潯陽酒甚濃，相勸時時醉。」《宋史．燕肅列傳》：「圖山水罨布濃淡，意象微遠，尤善為古木折竹。」 「 濃 」亦表示程度深，如東漢班固〈竇將軍北征頌〉：「上將崇至仁，行凱易，弘濃恩，降溫澤。」唐代孟郊〈雜怨〉：「持此一生薄，空成百恨濃。」南宋辛棄疾〈沁園春〉：「吊古愁濃，懷人日暮，一片心從天外歸。」
From " water" to " nong" sound. This refers to a lot of dew, which means thick and dense. "Shuowen": "Dense, revealing too much." Duan Yucai's note: "Every farmer has a strong voice." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Liaoxiao": "Liaobixiaosi, zero dew and thick." "Mao Zhuan": "Dense, thick appearance." "Xijing Miscellaneous": "Brushing to the clouds, mist and dense atmosphere." Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty. Qingping Tune>: "Clouds want clothes and flowers, but the spring breeze blows the threshold. " Dense" means more ingredients, as opposed to " light". Such as "Latent Theory. "Phase column": "The appearance has microscopic appearance, the color has intensity, the behavior has the thickness, the fate has to go." Tang Dynasty Bai Juyi "Early Autumn and Evening Look": "Xunyang wine is very strong, and each other is always drunk." "Song History. "Biography of Yan Su": "The landscape is thick and light, and the image is slightly distant. It is especially good at folding bamboo from ancient trees." " Nong" also means a deep degree. For example, in the Eastern Han Dynasty, Ban Gu's "General Dou's Beizheng Song": "Admiral Chong Zhi Ren, Xing Kai Yi, Hong Nong En, to cool down." Tang Dynasty Meng Jiao "Miscellaneous Complaint": "Hold this life thin, Hundreds of emptiness are filled with hatred." Southern Song Xin Qiji "Qinyuanchun": "Hanging on the ancient sorrows, conceiving people in the sun and sunset, and a heart returning from heaven."

濃字的基本解释

濃
nóng
见“浓”。

濃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nóng］
［《廣韻》女容切，平鍾，娘。］
“浓1”的繁体字。
(1)露多。
(2)厚；密；多。
(3)特指液体或气体中所含某种成分多。与“淡”、“薄”相对。
(4)指浓缩。
(5)谓程度深。
(6)艳丽。
(7)用同“儂”。我。
(8)用同“膿”。参见“濃包”。

濃字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　濃； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页654第21
【廣韻】女容切【集韻】【韻會】尼容切，?音醲。厚也。【增韻】濃淡之對。通作醲。　又【說文】露多也。【詩·小雅】零露濃濃。　又【集韻】【韻會】奴冬切。【正韻】奴宗切，?音農。義同。　【玉篇】亦作?。

濃字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
濃字的起名意思

暂无。

concentrated

concentrated
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nóng］
["Guangyun" female Rongqie, Pingzhong, mother. ]
Traditional characters for "浓1".
(1) Ludo.
(2) Thick; dense; much.
(3) Specifically refers to the liquid or gas containing a certain amount of ingredients. Contrast with "light" and "thin".
(4) Refers to concentration.
(5) It is said that the degree is deep.
(6) Showy.
(7) Use the same as "Nong". I.
(8) Use the same as "pus". See "concentrated bag".
concentrated

Name meaning

nóng
вм. 浓
Radicals: 氵, 農  (tsunami, farming)
Meaning Mnemonic
If a tsunami hits while you're farming, you'll have to wear really thick clothes to deal with it. The water is thick with fish and cars and other ripped-up debris too, which makes it even harder.
Imagine putting on your thick farming suit as the tsunami comes at you. You hold onto your hoe and brace yourself for the wall of water.
Reading Mnemonic
You knew to put on your thick tsunami-proof farming gear because Nostradamus (のう) warned you it was coming. He sent a message to your brain yesterday so you'd know what to wear today.
Thanks Nostradamus, now I'm in my nice, thick gear, struggling to hoe my fields through this wall of tsunami water. But I'm not dead and I'm not wet.
